ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: See the final fate of those who were warned -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Look, then how was the end of those who had been warned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Observe, then, what was the end of those that had been warned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: See how terrible was the end of those who were warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore see what sort of fate befell those who were warned!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then see what was the end of those who were warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then see how was the end of those warned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and behold, how was the end of them that were warned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then see the nature of the consequence for those warned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: See how those who were warned met their end!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So behold what wise hath been the end of those who were warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So observe how was the fate of those who were warned
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then see what was the end of those who were admonished (but heeded not),-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then see what was the end of those who were warned (but heeded not).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: See then the end of those who were warned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So observe the end of those who were warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:73] So behold how was the consequence for them who were warned, namely, the disbelievers: in other words the sequel for them was [that they ended up in] the chastisement;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then see) Muhammad (the nature of the consequence for) the requital of (those warned) of those who were warned by the messenger, but chose to disbelieve, how we destroyed them,
